about_the_game:
In this game you play as a character who is experiencing life difficulties and trying to overcome them.

you play as a 2D character in the form of a square, who wanders through tunnels, passes through mazes, fights off enemies by shooting at them.

there are mechanics: you can not touch some walls so as not to die, touching special objects they make sounds of different musical instruments, shoot at the vrogs and kill them, but if they come close they will kill you.

The game is very abstract and executed from top to bottom.
Basically it's an adventure genre, but there are also elements of a shooter.
The game uses 2D graphics, there are also interesting game mechanics
that you will learn about at the very beginning and will use them as the game progresses.

This game is suitable for real gourmet gamers.

name: Abstract World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or above
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.5+ GHz Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1gb) / AMD Radeon HD6670 (1gb)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Abstract top-down game with shooter elements.
